General.Name: YD More Investments Ltd
General.Description: Y.D. More Investments Ltd engages in the investment management business in Israel. It manages investment portfolio, private investment funds, mutual funds, pension funds, provident funds, and training funds, as well as other alternative investment platforms for clients. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

4.Name: Mr. Or  Keren
4.Title: Chief Investment Officer & SVP - Moore Provident
